moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
moves.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.description: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Extrasensory
moves.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Grudge
moves.description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.
